entry.title: $2600 // Recent new 3 bedroom apartment!
entry.content:
Recent new 3 bedroom apartment! Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone countertops. Central A/C and hardwood floors. Enjoy the luxury of laundry in the building! Just minutes from the Bedford-Nostrand Ave (G), Nostrand A/C trains.

AMENITIES
Stainless Steel Appliances
Central A/C
Hardwood Floors
Laundry in building
Stone countertops

entry.title: $1925 // Brand new 1.5 bedroom_Hardwood floors_High Ceilings!
entry.content:
ID: 6989

1.5 Bed / 1 Bath in Brooklyn.This brand new rental building features high end finishes, spacious layouts, and a unique and comfortable ambiance. Impeccably and creatively designed - from the gorgeous exposed brick walls, to the flawless interior finishes of every apartment. Situated in the best of historic and re-emerging Bedford Stuyvesant, which includes lovely tree lined streets, beautiful original brownstones, fine eateries, wine bars and supermarkets. Convenient to everything.

AMENITIES
Stainless Steel Appliances
Built in microwave
Granite countertops
High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Exposed brick
Private backyard

***Please text Vaner at five-1-six-two1-eight-17-three-nine and mention specific ad you're referring to. I'm a real person who can help you find your perfect apartment. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask! Foreign applicants welcome, we take insurent and or multiple months paid up front.
